definition: numerous/common people (or populace)/born of a concubine

sentences.english: The restaurant is full of chatter and laughter, and there is a general sense of wellbeing.
sentences.chinese: 餐厅里充满欢声笑语，总的给人一种富庶的感觉。

sentences.english: And the closure of the rich land of Shang Yang.
Expensive to maintain, though, only the wealthiest states can afford them.
sentences.chinese: 宪兵骑士维护费用高昂，只有富庶国家方有财力成军。

sentences.english: Szechwan is called the Heavenly Kingdom. There are lots of rich people there.
sentences.chinese: 四川是天府之国，那可富庶得很哪。

sentences.english: In the abundant Jiangnan, rice is an indispensable part of life here.
sentences.chinese: 富庶的江南地区，稻米是生活中不可缺少的部分。

sentences.english: Libya is North Africa’s most prosperous country, given its tremendous oil wealth and small population.
sentences.chinese: 利比亚油多人少，是北非最富庶的国家。

definition: (lit.) land of fish and rice/(fig.) fertile region/land of milk and honey
Fuyu county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
rich and powerful/rich and influential person/big shot
government revenue/tributary goods and finances/finances and taxes/wealth/property/belongings
